chicken.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a common farm bird that is kept for its meat and eggs
chicken.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the meat from this bird eaten as food
chicken.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone who is not at all brave
chicken.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a game in which children do something dangerous, for example stand on a railway line when a train is coming, and try to be the one who continues doing it for the longest time
chicken.translation[0].note_box[0].headi: – Meaning 2: the meat from this bird eaten as food
chicken.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: We never buy cheap frozen chicken.
All the chicken we serve is free-range.
For dinner we're having roast chicken.
They filled their plates with fried chicken.
For this recipe, you will need a two pounds of skinless chicken.
Chop the chicken breast into pieces.
You will need two chicken pieces per person.
party food, such as sandwiches and chicken drumsticks
I'll make a chicken pie with the leftovers.
chicken.translation[2].definitions[0].de: not brave enough to do something
chicken.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Dave’s too chicken to ask her out.
